00030 #ifndef SC_SIGNAL_RESOLVED_H
00031 #define SC_SIGNAL_RESOLVED_H
00032 
00033 
00034 #include "sysc/communication/sc_signal.h"
00035 
00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(SC_WIN_DLL_WARN)
00037 #pragma warning(push)
00038 #pragma warning(disable: 4251) // DLL import for std::vector
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 namespace sc_core {
00042 
00043 class sc_process_b;
00044 
00045 extern SC_API const sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t sc_logic_resolution_tbl[4][4];
00046 
00047 
00048 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 //  CLASS : sc_signal_resolved
00050 //
00051 //  The resolved signal class.
00052 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 
00054 class SC_API sc_signal_resolved
00055 : public sc_signal<sc_dt::sc_logic,SC_MANY_WRITERS>
00056 {
00057 public:
00058 
00059     // typedefs
00060 
00061     typedef sc_signal_resolved                         this_type;
00062     typedef sc_signal<sc_dt::sc_logic,SC_MANY_WRITERS> base_type;
00063     typedef sc_dt::sc_logic                            value_type;
00064 
00065 public:
00066 
00067     // constructors
00068 
00069     sc_signal_resolved()
00070       : base_type( sc_gen_unique_name( "signal_resolved" ) )
00071       , m_proc_vec(), m_val_vec()
00072     {}
00073 
00074     explicit sc_signal_resolved( const char* name_ )
00075       : base_type( name_ )
00076       , m_proc_vec(), m_val_vec()
00077     {}
00078 
00079     sc_signal_resolved( const char* name_, const value_type& initial_value_ )
00080       : base_type( name_, initial_value_ )
00081       , m_proc_vec() , m_val_vec()
00082     {}
00083 
00084     // interface methods
00085 
00086     virtual void register_port( sc_port_base&, const char* )
00087         {}
00088 
00089 
00090     // write the new value
00091     virtual void write( const value_type& );
00092 
00093 
00094     // other methods
00095     virtual const char* kind() const
00096         { return "sc_signal_resolved"; }
00097 
00098 
00099     // assignment
00100     this_type& operator = ( const value_type& a )
00101       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00102 
00103     this_type& operator = ( const sc_signal_in_if<value_type>& a )
00104       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00105 
00106     this_type& operator = ( const this_type& a )
00107       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00108 
00109 protected:
00110     virtual void update();
00111 
00112 protected:
00113     std::vector<sc_process_b*> m_proc_vec; // processes writing this signal
00114     std::vector<value_type>    m_val_vec;  // new values written this signal
00115 
00116 private:
00117 
00118     // disabled
00119     sc_signal_resolved( const this_type& );
00120 };
00121 
00122 } // namespace sc_core
00123
